location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the folio number, 118, is written in pencil, enclosed in a circle, and is located in the top right corner of the recto side of the folio. A previous foliation number has been superseded and therefore crossed out.Dimensions: 460 x 295 mm.Materials: printed on paper.

mods.abstract: Map of the C Plan (Map No. 10) for the partition of Palestine, as proposed by the Palestine Partition Commission, 1937, showing suggested boundaries of Northern Mandated Territory, Arab State, Jewish State, Jerusalem Enclave (Mandated Territory), and Southern Mandated Territory in Palestine, and including (inset) Southern Palestine.Publication: Survey of Palestine, 1937; Ordnance Survey, 1938.
